request_sync.name: Request sync
request_sync.description: Sends a request_sync command to Google.

agent_user_id.name: Agent user ID
agent_user_id.description: Only needed for automations. Specific Home Assistant user id (not username, ID in configuration > users > under username) to sync with Google Assistant. Do not need when you call this service through Home Assistant front end or API. Used in automation script or other place where context.user_id is missing.
